comment.author: 25252126@N08
comment._content: This photo is a good sample in the flickr. It is awarded the flickr Award! flickrAward (post1 – award 5) Please Tag your photo with “flickrAward” and visit the flickr Award Gallery Please post the photo to flickr Award 5+ thread if you received 5 or more of this award
